name: William J. SHEPPARD, Insurance Commissioner of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania v. OLD HERITAGE MUTUAL INSURANCE COMPANY, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Sheppard v. Old Heritage Mutual Insurance

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: William J. SHEPPARD, Insurance Commissioner of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania v. OLD HERITAGE MUTUAL INSURANCE COMPANY, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed. 51 Pa.Cmwlth. 490, 414 A.2d 1109.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Malcolm H. Waldron, Jr., Philadelphia, for appellant.
Albert J. Strohecker, III, Linda S. Kaiser, Asst. Attys. Gen., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
452 A.2d 1017
William J. SHEPPARD, Insurance Commissioner of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania v. OLD HERITAGE MUTUAL INSURANCE COMPANY, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 19, 1982.
Decided Dec. 10, 1982.
Malcolm H. Waldron, Jr., Philadelphia, for appellant.
Albert J. Strohecker, III, Linda S. Kaiser, Asst. Attys. Gen., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
